definition: Dinosauria, superorder within class Sauropsida containing dinosaurs and birds
theropod (beast-footed dinosaur group)/suborder Theropoda within order Saurischia containing carnivorous dinosaurs

sentences.english: The former scene by dinosaur was more wonderful than human's.
sentences.chinese: 剛退場的恐龍戲碼，就比我們精彩有趣得多了。

sentences.english: But what about other dinosaur relatives that are alive today?
sentences.chinese: 那麼今日仍倖存的恐龍親戚們是什麼情況呢？

sentences.english: This is the first evidence of snakes eating dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 這是首次發現的蛇捕食恐龍的證據。

sentences.english: Epcot also has the Universe of Energy that takes you back to the times of the dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 愛波皮卡也有能量宇宙，帶你回到恐龍世紀。

sentences.english: Some speculate that it may be a plesiosaur that survived the rest of the dinosaur population.
sentences.chinese: 一些人猜測這可能是恐龍中存活下來的蛇頸龍。
阿爾貝塔龍是隻大恐龍。

sentences.english: A large amount of Dinosaurs skeleton fossils are discovered in Upper Cretaceous strata at the Meipu Town, Yunxian County of Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 湖北省鄖縣梅鋪鎮晚白堊世地層中發現大量恐龍化石。

sentences.english: These conditions gave rise to the dinosaurs, pterosaurs, and early crocodilians.
sentences.chinese: 這些條件，引起了恐龍，翼龍，鱷魚和早期。

sentences.english: Dr. Smith, I don’t see the dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯博士，我沒有看到恐龍。

sentences.english: The type of dinosaur that was found is known as a theropod.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種獸腳亞目肉食恐龍。

sentences.english: That means we may have been underestimating the size of many dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着，我們可能已經低估了許多恐龍的大小。

sentences.english: Allosaurus was the top predatory dinosaur of the late Jurassic period in North America.
sentences.chinese: 異龍是最大的掠奪性恐龍的晚侏羅紀期間在北美地區。

sentences.english: T. rex probably evolved from a similar animal.
sentences.chinese: 雷克斯暴龍很可能是從類似的恐龍進化而成的。

sentences.english: "Of course, just as soon as I finish this bottle, " said the dinosaur.
sentences.chinese: “沒問題，擠完這瓶我就馬上給你，”恐龍說。

sentences.english: But it was rather smaller than Tyrannosaurs .
sentences.chinese: 但是這種恐龍比暴龍小得多。

definition: site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
